backend/main.mo: Defines a Book type, stores a single Honeydew entry, and exposes a query method to return the book list.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles configuring a color‑variable theme and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML root document loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for the landing and reader pages within a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Book card UI component with a read button that navigates to the reader page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines a global page layout with header, footer, and wrapped content area.
frontend/src/constants/books.ts: Exports the static path to the Honeydew PDF asset with instructions for replacement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to internet identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Fetches the book catalog from the backend using React Query and the actor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and persistent identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines a warm educational OKLCH color palette and global typography styles via Tailwind.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero banner, ebook list from useBooks, loading/error states, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderPage.tsx: Displays a selected book’s PDF in an iframe, handling loading, navigation, and download via the book’s asset path.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, requirements, and image asset needs for the Honeydew ebook website.
